src_original: avidyā cennābhaviṣyannaiva saṃskārāḥ prajñāsyante /  evaṃ yāvajjātiścennābhaviṣyajjarāmaraṇaṃ na prajñāsyate /  athavā, satyāmavidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇāmabhinirvṛttirbhavati /  evaṃ yāvajjātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
tgt_original: 若無無明，則無行，然有無明，即有行，乃至有生緣老死得生。

src_original: atrāvidyāyā naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ saṃskārānabhinirvartayāmīti /  saṃskārāṇāmapi naivaṃ bhavati vayamavidyayābhinirvartitā iti /
tgt_original: 其無明不作是念： 『我能生行。 』行不作是念：

src_original: evaṃ yāvajjāterapi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ jarāmaraṇamabhinirvartayāmīti /
tgt_original: 『我從無明生。

src_original: jarāmaraṇasyāpi naivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ jātyābhinirvartitamiti /
tgt_original: 』乃至生不作是念： 『我能生老死。

src_original: atha ca satyāmavidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇābhinirvṛtti rbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /  evaṃ yāvajjātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
tgt_original: 』然有無明即有行生，乃至有生即有老死生。

src_original: evamādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ //
tgt_original: 如是內緣生法繫屬於因。

src_original: kathamādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavya iti?
tgt_original: 「云何內緣生法繫屬於緣？

src_original: ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt /
tgt_original: 六界和合生。

src_original: katameṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt?
tgt_original: 云何六界和合？

src_original: yadidaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātūnāṃ samavāyādādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 所謂地、水、火、風、空、識界和合緣生繫屬於緣。

src_original: tatrādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pṛthivīdhātuḥ katamaḥ?
tgt_original: 云何地界？

src_original: yaḥ kāyasya saṃśleṣātkaṭhinabhāvamabhinirvartayati,  ayamucyate pṛthivīdhātuḥ /
tgt_original: 令身聚合堅體，名為地界。

src_original: yaḥ kāyasyānuparigrahakṛtyaṃ karoti,  ayamucyate 'bdhātuḥ /
tgt_original: 云何水界？ 令身作攝持，名為水界。

src_original: yaḥ kāyasyāśitabhakṣitaṃ paripācayati,  ayamucyate tejodhātuḥ /
tgt_original: 云何火界？ 令身中食飲成就，名為火界。

src_original: yaḥ kāyasya āśvāsapraśvāsakṛtyaṃ karoti,  ayamucyate vāyudhātuḥ /
tgt_original: 云何風界？ 令身中作出入息，名為風界。

src_original: yaḥ kāyasyāntaḥ śauṣīryamabhinirvartayati,  ayamucyate ākāśadhātuḥ /
tgt_original: 云何空界？ 令身中成竅隙，名為空界。

src_original: yo nāmarūpamabhinirvartayati naḍakalāpayogena pañcavijñānakāyasaṃyuktaṃ sāsravaṃ ca manovijñānam,  ayamucyate bhikṣavo vijñānadhātuḥ /
tgt_original: 云何識界？ 令轉名色如束蘆，五識相應有漏意識，名為識界。

src_original: tatra asatāmeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ kāyasyotpattirna bhavati /
tgt_original: 若無六界，則不成身。

src_original: yadā tvādhyātmikaḥ pṛthivīdhāturavikalo bhavati,  evamaptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātavaścāvikalā bhavanti,  tataḥ sarveṣāṃ samavāyātkāyasyotpattirbhavati /
tgt_original: 若不闕內地界，不闕水、火、風、空、識界，則一切和合能生其身。

src_original: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ kāyasya kaṭhinabhāvamabhinirvartayāmīti /
tgt_original: 其地界不念： 『我能令身聚合堅體。

src_original: abdhātornaivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ kāyasyānuparigrahakṛtyaṃ karomīti /  tejodhātornaivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ kāyasyāśitapītakhāditaṃ paripācayāmīti /  vāyudhātornaivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ kāyasyāśvāsapraśvāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
tgt_original: 』水界不念： 『我能令身作攝持。 』火界不念： 『我能令身中食飲成就。 』風界不念：

src_original: ākāśadhātornaivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ kāyasyāntaḥśauṣīryamabhinirvartayāmīti /
tgt_original: 『我能令身作出入息。 』空界不念：

src_original: tacca nāma rūpam /  nāmarūpasaṃniśritānīndriyāṇi ṣaḍāyatanam /
tgt_original: 彼名色所依諸根則六處。

src_original: trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ /
tgt_original: 三法和合名為觸。

src_original: sparśānubhavo vedanā /  vedanādhyavasānaṃ tṛṣṇā /  tṛṣṇāvaipulyamuipādānam /  upādānanirjātaṃ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma bhavaḥ /
tgt_original: 觸生受。 受耽著，故生愛。 愛廣大，故名為取。 取復生有。

src_original: bhavahetukaḥ skandhaprādurbhāvo jātiḥ /  jātasya skandhasya paripāko jarā /
tgt_original: 業有作因生蘊。 蘊熟，故名老；

src_original: jīrṇasya skandhasya vināśo maraṇam /  mriyamāṇasya saṃmūḍhasya sābhiṣvaṅgasyāntardāhaḥ śokaḥ /
tgt_original: 蘊壞，故名死； 於愛迷惑、貪著、熱惱，故名愁；

src_original: śokotthamālapanaṃ paridevaḥ /
tgt_original: 追感往事、言音，哀慼，名為歎；

src_original: pañcavijñānakāyasaṃyuktamasātamanubhavanaṃ duḥkham /
tgt_original: 五識身相應，名為苦；

src_original: ye cāpyanye evamādaya upakleśāste upāyāsā iti //
tgt_original: 隨煩惱，故名為惱。

src_original: tatra mohāndhakārārthenāvidyā /
tgt_original: 愚闇，名無明；

src_original: abhisaṃskārārthena saṃskārāḥ /
tgt_original: 造作，名為行；

src_original: vijñāpanārthena vijñānam /
tgt_original: 了別，名為識；

src_original: anyonyopastambhanārthena nāmarūpam /
tgt_original: 互相攝持，名為名色；

src_original: āyadvārārthena ṣaḍāyatanam /
tgt_original: 依處所，故名為六處；

src_original: sparśanārthena sparśaḥ /  anubhavanārthena vedanā /
tgt_original: 觸境，故名為觸； 領納，故名受；

src_original: paritarṣaṇārthena tṛṣṇā /
tgt_original: 渴愛，故名為愛；

src_original: upādānārthenopādānam /
tgt_original: 取著，故名為取；

src_original: punarbhavārthena bhavaḥ /  janmārthena jātiḥ /
tgt_original: 取復生有，故名為有； 能生，故名生；

src_original: paripākārthena jarā /
tgt_original: 根熟，故名老；

src_original: vināśārthena maraṇam /
tgt_original: 滅壞，故名死；

src_original: śocanārthena śokaḥ /  paridevanārthena paridevaḥ kāyaparipīḍanārthena duḥkham /
tgt_original: 哀慼，故名愁； 悵怏，故名歎； 意不悅，故名憂；

src_original: cittasaṃpīḍanārthena daurmanasyam /  upakleśārthenopāyāsāḥ //
tgt_original: 逼迫身，故名為苦； 不稱情，故名惱。

src_original: athavā tattve 'pratipattirmithyāpratipattirajñānamavidyā /
tgt_original: 不修真實行，名邪行； 無知，名無明。

src_original: evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante puṇyopagā apuṇyopagā āneñjyopagāḥ /
tgt_original: 有無明故，種種造作福近行行、非福近行行、不動近行行。

src_original: tatra puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati /  apuṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmapuṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati /  āneñjyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmāneñjyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati /  idamucyate vijñānam /
tgt_original: 起福近行行、非福近行行者，故名為識，是故名為無明緣行。 起非福近行行、非福近行行者，亦即是識，是故名行緣識。

src_original: vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamiti vedanādayo 'rūpiṇaścatvāraḥ skandhāstatra tatra bhave nāmayantīti nāma /  saharūpaskandhena ca nāma rūpaṃ ceti nāmarūpamucyate /
tgt_original: 起不動近行行、不動近行行者，亦是於識，是故名為識緣名色。

src_original: nāmarūpavivṛddhayā ṣaḍbhirāyatanadvāraiḥ kṛtyakriyāḥ pravartante prajñāyante,  tannāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanamityucyate /
tgt_original: 名色增長作六處門，是故名為名色緣六處。

src_original: ṣaḍbhyaścāyataṃebhyaḥ ṣaṭ sparśakāyāḥ pravartante,  ayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśa ityucyate /
tgt_original: 六處身轉，是故名為六處緣觸。

src_original: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /  iyamucyate bhikṣavaḥ sparśapratyayā vedaneti /
tgt_original: 同類觸生同類受，是故觸緣受。

src_original: yastāṃ vedanāṃ viśeṣeṇāsvādayati abhinandati adhyavasyati adhyavasāya tiṣṭhati,  sā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇetyucyate /
tgt_original: 於受差別耽著喜悅，是故名為受緣愛。

src_original: āsvādanābhinandanādhyavasānasthānādātmapriyarūpasātarūpairviyogo mā bhūnnityamaparityāgo bhavediti yaivaṃ prārthanā idamucyate bhikṣavastṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānam  yatra vastuni satṛṣṇastasya vastuno 'rjanāya viṭhapanāyopādānamupādatte,  tatra tatra prārthayate,
tgt_original: 愛耽著樂，故愛不捨，數數忻求，故名為愛緣取。

src_original: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā ca,  sa upādānapratyayo bhava ityucyate /
tgt_original: 如是營求，復生有起業於身、於語、於意，是故名為取緣有。

src_original: (Pp_247) tatkarmanirjātānāṃ skandhānāmabhinirvṛtiryā sā bhavapratyayā jātirityucyate /
tgt_original: 從業生五蘊轉，名為有緣生。

src_original: jātyābhinirvṛttānāṃ skandhānāmupacayanaparipākādvināśo bhavati /  tadidaṃ jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamityucyate //
tgt_original: 從生蘊令熟壞滅，名生緣老死。

src_original: evamayaṃ dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādo 'nyonyahetuko 'nyonyapratyayo naivānityo naiva  nityo na saṃskṛto nāsaṃskṛto nāhetuko nāpratyayo na vedayitā nāvedayitā na pratītyasamutpanno
tgt_original: 如是名為十二緣生。

src_original: nāpratītyasamutpanno na kṣayadharmo nākṣayadharmo na vināśadharmo nāvināśadharmo  na nirodhadharmo nānirodhadharmo 'nādikālapravṛtto 'nucchinno 'nupravartate nadīsrotavat //
tgt_original: 迭互為因，不常、不造作、無思，亦無緣生、無盡法、無離欲法、無滅法，無始來流轉不間斷隨轉，如河駛流。

src_original: yadyapyayaṃ dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādo 'nucchinno 'nupravartate nadīsrotavat,  atha cemānyasya dvādaśāṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāryaṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante /
tgt_original: 「設使緣生不間斷隨轉如河駛流，是十二支緣生，四支和合而作轉因。

src_original: katamāni catvāri?
tgt_original: 云何為四？

src_original: yaduta avidyā tṛṣṇā karma vijñānaṃ ca /
tgt_original: 所謂無明、愛、業、識。

src_original: tatra vijñānaṃ bījasvabhāvatvena hetuḥ /  karma kṣetrasvabhāvatvena hetuḥ /  avidyā tṛṣṇā ca kleśasvabhāvatvena hetuḥ /
tgt_original: 是識種子自性為因，業田自性為因，無明、愛、煩惱自性為因。

src_original: karmakleśā vijñānabījaṃ janayanti /
tgt_original: 業、煩惱、識能生種子。

src_original: tatra karma vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karoti /  tṛṣṇā vijñānabījaṃ snehayati /  avidyā vijñānabījamavakirati /  asatāṃ teṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ vijñānabījasyabhinirvṛttirna bhavati /
tgt_original: 如是業、識作種子田，愛、識作種子沃潤，無明、識令種子開發。

src_original: tatra karmaṇo naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomīti /
tgt_original: 其業不作是念： 『我與識種子作田。

src_original: tṛṣṇāyā api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānasya snehakāryaṃ karomiti /
tgt_original: 』愛不作是念： 『我與識種子作沃潤。

src_original: avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakirāmīti /
tgt_original: 』無明不作是念： 『我令識種子開發。

src_original: vijñānabījasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanitamiti //
tgt_original: 』識種子亦不作是念： 『我從眾緣而生。

src_original: atha ca vijñānabījaṃ karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehābhiṣyanditamavidyayā svavakīrṇaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ virohati /  tatratatropapattyāṃyatanapratisaṃdhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati /
tgt_original: 』然實識種子安立業、煩惱，以愛令沃潤，以無明土覆，生名色芽。

src_original: sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃ kṛtoa na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvarakṛto na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ  atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogād,  ṛtusamavāyād,
tgt_original: 其名色芽不自作、不他作、不二俱作、不自在天作、不時變易作、不從自性生、不繫屬因、無因亦不生，然復從父母和合時相應，及餘緣相應相續生。

src_original: anyeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ samavāyād āsvādānuviddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati
tgt_original: 是識種子於母腹中名色芽生。

src_original: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣvaparigraheṣvamameṣvākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt //  tadyathā pañcabhiḥ kāraṇaiścakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
tgt_original: 「於無主、無我授、法如幻相因緣不闕，從五種緣生眼識。

src_original: katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何五種？

src_original: yaduta cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ cālokaṃ cākāśaṃ ca tajjamanasikāraṃ ca pratītyotpadyate cakṣurvijñānam /
tgt_original: 眼緣色、明、虛空，從彼生作意。

src_original: tatra cakṣurvijñānasya cakṣurāśrayakṛtyaṃ karoti /  rūpamālambanakṛtyaṃ karoti /  āloko 'vabhāsakṛtyaṃ karoti /  ākāśamanāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karoti /  tajjamanasikāraḥ samanvāharaṇakṛtyaṃ karoti /
tgt_original: 眼識作依止，色作所緣，光明以為照，虛空作無礙，從彼生作意以為審慮。

src_original: asatāmeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ notpadyate /
tgt_original: 若無眾緣，眼識不生。

src_original: yadā tu cakṣurādhyātmikamāyatanamavikalaṃ bhavati,  evaṃ rūpālokākāśatajjamanasikārāścāvikalā bhavanti,
tgt_original: 若闕內眼處，如是色、光明、虛空、作意，則眼識不生。

src_original: tataḥ sarveṣāṃ samavāyāccakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
tgt_original: 如是五緣不闕，則一切和合，能生眼識。

src_original: tatra cakṣuṣo naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāśrayakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
tgt_original: 其眼不作是念： 『我與眼識作所依。

src_original: ālokasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāvabhāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti /  ākāśasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyānāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomiti /
tgt_original: 』其色不作是念： 『我與眼識為所緣。 』光明不作是念： 『我與眼識作照緣。 』虛空不作是念：

src_original: tajjamanasikārasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya samanvāharaṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti /  cakṣurvijñānasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanitamiti /
tgt_original: 『我與眼識為無礙緣。 』所生意不作是念： 『我與眼識作審慮。 』又眼識不作是念：

src_original: atha ca satāmeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ samavāyāccakṣurvijñānasyotpattirbhavati /
tgt_original: 『我為眾多緣所生。 』然有眾多緣而生眼識。

src_original: evaṃ śeṣāṇāmindriyāṇāṃ yathāyogaṃ karaṇīyam //
tgt_original: 餘四根者應如前知。

src_original: tatra na kaściddharmo 'smāllokātparalokaṃ saṃkrāmati /
tgt_original: 「實無有法不從此世移轉至於彼。

src_original: asti ca karmaphalaprativijñaptirhetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt /
tgt_original: 有業報施設，因緣不闕故。

src_original: tadyathā bhikṣavaḥ supariśuddhe ādarśamaṇḍale mukhapratibimbakaṃ dṛśyate,  na ca tatrādarśamaṇḍale mukhaṃ saṃkrāmati,  asti ca mukhaprativijñaptirhetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt,
tgt_original: 譬如明鏡現其面像，其面像不移轉至於鏡中，而此鏡中有其面像，因緣不闕故。

src_original: evamasmāllokānna kaściccyuto nāpyanyatropapannaḥ,
tgt_original: 如是不從此滅至於餘處。

src_original: asti ca karmaphalaprativijñaptirhetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt /
tgt_original: 有業果感招，因緣不闕故。

src_original: tadyathā bhikṣavaścandramaṇḍalaṃ catvāriṃśadyojanaśatamūrdhvaṃ vrajati,  atha ca punaḥ parītte 'pyudakabhājane candrasya pratibimbaṃ dṛśyate,  na ca tasmātsthānādūrdhvaṃ nabhasaścyutaṃ parītte udakasya bhājane saṃkrāntaṃ bhavati asti ca candramaṇḍalaprativijñaptirhetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt
tgt_original: 譬如月輪去地四萬由旬，於全器中而有少水則現月像，而實不從彼謝至於全器少水中現，然有眾緣和合，影現如是。

src_original: evamasmāllokānna kaściccyuto nānyatropapannaḥ,  asti ca karmaphalaprativijñaptirhetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt //
tgt_original: 不從此滅生於餘處，有業報相感，因緣不闕故。

src_original: tadyathā- agnirupādānapratyaye sati jvalati,  upādānavaikalyānna jvalati,
tgt_original: 譬如無薪，火則不生； 有薪，則火生。

src_original: evameva bhikṣavaḥ karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatratatropapattyāyatanapratisaṃdhau  mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣvaparigraheṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu  amameṣu kṛtrimeṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt //
tgt_original: 業、煩惱所生識種子，從彼生處相續，名色芽轉。 如是無主、無我法、無所攝法，互為因緣，如幻相、自性法，因緣不闕。

src_original: tatrādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairdraṣṭavyaḥ /  katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ?
tgt_original: 「內緣生法五種應知：

src_original: na śāśvatato nocchedato na saṃkrāntitaḥ parīttahetuvipulaphalābhinirvṛttitastatsadṛśānuprabandhataśceti /
tgt_original: 不常、不斷、不移轉、因少果多、相似相續生。
